content: this pattern is also available for free on my website here 1 learn to crochet the jeremiah baby blanket a chunky design perfect for babies born during the cooler months pair cozy colors with the falling leaves stitch for a truly autumnal baby blanket the colors in this baby blanket as well as the name of the blanket are inspired by the following bible passage blessed are those who trust in the lord the lord will be their trust they are like a tree planted beside the waters that stretches out its roots to the stream it does not fear heat when it comes its leaves stay green in the year of drought it shows no distress but still produces fruit jeremiah 17 7-8 so we have brown for the tree blue for the stream orange for heat green for the leaves a pale brown for drought and red for fruit i loved letting the imagery in this passage guide the color choices for this blanket this imagery also guided the stitch choice which is the falling leaves stitch the blanket is finished with one of my favorite blanket borders the camel stitch i hope you enjoy this pattern abbreviations us chain s chain s double_crochet s double_crochet s repeat repeat round s round s rs right side single_crochet s single_crochet s slip_stitch slip_stitch space s space s st s stitch es ws wrong side yo yarn over special stitch leaf yo insert your hook in designated st pull up a loop you will have 3 loops on your hook yo insert your hook in the same st pull up a loop you will have 5 loops on your hook yo pull through the first 4 loops on your hook you will have 2 loops left on your hook yo
